flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to stay 1000*0.2=<<1000*0.2=200>>200 pounds under the max
So he wants to stay under 1000-200=<<1000-200=799>>799 pounds
That means he can put 799-250=<<799-250=549>>549 pounds on the bar
#### 549

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 799. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
